alert.note: Alert for Kings; Nassau; Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 18 at 6:37AM EST until February 18 at 7:30AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Queens County in southeastern New York... Kings County in southeastern New York... Nassau County in southeastern New York... * Until 730 AM EST. * At 637 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Co-op City to near Morganville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Flushing and Great Neck around 645 AM EST. Manhasset around 650 AM EST. Garden City and Mineola around 655 AM EST. Levittown and Syosset around 700 AM EST. Plainview and Woodbury around 705 AM EST. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
